Definition.WordDefinition: Rhesus \Rhe"sus\, n. [L. Rhesus, a proper name, Gr. ???.] (Zo["o]l.) A monkey; the bhunder. [1913 Webster]
rhesus n : of southern Asia; used in medical research [syn: {rhesus monkey}, {Macaca mulatta}]
